subject: X plus ultra pedals
description_text:
Hello,

I was wondering what the difference between the older x plus ultra pedals
and the new version? What is RGB Feedback?

Thank you

conversations.body_text: Hi TheBoarderXman,      PlusX uses 12-bit resolution.    ProX Ultra uses 16-bit resolution.    ProX Ultra supports simultaneous sampling of three pedal channels.    PlusX uses polling-based sampling for pedal signals.    ProX Ultra supports telemetry-based LED flashing, pressure indicator LEDs, and cumulative vibration feedback.
